revisionDesc.change: Vote - AcceptText - See comments by Claytor. I agree that this should be renamed to the Chiron "edition". What appears in papyri.info will then be more readable and accurate.

Vote - AcceptText - Inclined to rename Chiron 47 and remove deprecated readings, but the author explicitly denies this is a new edition (p. 274). To cite the corrected readings, better to use p. 297, where the edition itself is, rather than the “Lesetext.” For nested corrections, use ||ed|| then just |. E.g.: <:[καταβ]ο̣λ̣ῇ=A. Jördens, Chiron 47 (2017) 297||ed||:.6ο̣λη=BL 1.256|.8η:>. Line 6: remove correction; accent in νομοῦ can be tacitly corrected, as νόμου was just a mistaken interpretation of the ed. pr., which lacks accents. Line 12 correction: in original reading, change to final sigma: μὴ ἐξ ἧς. Later in l. 12, one question mark is sufficient in [κ]ρ̣[ί]σ̣ε̣ω̣ς(?)=BL 1.256. Line 14 add reg συλλελύσθαι I suppose. Line 14: remove correction <:ἢ=A. Jördens, Chiron 47 (2017) 276|ed|ἡ:> (mistaken entry again). Line 15 sigma in ο̣ἱ̣ σ[.7]=BL 1.256. Line 16 correction: final sigma in original reading ἀποστάσεως. Line 19: final sigma in original reading [ἁμ]ί̣λλης. Line 20 final sigma in original text. Line 24 reg ἐκλυσαμένῳ needs to be added.
